Class GovernmentService

java.lang.Object
com.csaba79coder.bestprotocol.model.government.service.GovernmentService
@Service public class GovernmentService extends Object
Service class for managing Government and its translations.

    • findAllGovernmentsByLangAndGovernmentId

      public List<com.csaba79coder.bestprotocol.model.GovernmentTranslationModel> findAllGovernmentsByLangAndGovernmentId(String lang)
      Finds all governments in the specified language and maps them to GovernmentTranslationModel objects.
      Parameters:
      lang - the language code of the desired language
      Returns:
      a list of GovernmentTranslationModel objects

    • findAllGovernmentsByLangAndGovernmentId

      public List<com.csaba79coder.bestprotocol.model.GovernmentTranslationModel> findAllGovernmentsByLangAndGovernmentId(String lang, Long id)
      Returns a list of GovernmentTranslationModel objects that contain translations for a specific language and government ID.
      Parameters:
      lang - the language short name for the translations
      id - the ID of the government entity to search for translations
      Returns:
      a list of GovernmentTranslationModel objects that match the search criteria

    • findGovernmentById

      public GovernmentTranslation findGovernmentById(Long id)
      Returns the GovernmentTranslation object with the given ID, or throws a NoSuchElementException if no such object exists.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the GovernmentTranslation to retrieve
      Returns:
      the GovernmentTranslation object with the given ID
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if no GovernmentTranslation with the given ID exists
